content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
The final answer is "multiplayer fun!" with Millionaire on your PlayStation®3 system. Try to win $1,000,000 by correctly answering multiple choice questions, each worth an increasing amount of money. Seek help for stumper questions via lifelines like "Ask the Audience", "Double Dip" or "Phone a Friend". With a multiplayer mode played on one PS3™ or online through the PlayStation®Network, it's never been so much fun to see if your final answer is the one that will bring you to the top of the money tree!
FEATURES

"True-to-TV" Experience: Favorite elements from TV show including the classic stage, more than 2500 questions, hint system via "Lifelines", and authentic theme music.

3 Modes of Play: Play Solo, enjoy Multiplayer mode on one PS3™, or play online through PlayStation®Network. .

Bonus Items: Unlock bonus customization options as reward for your progress.

Voice Chat: Chat with other players using any compatible wireless headset for the PlayStation®3 system.

©2010 Disney ABC Domestic Television. All rights reserved. "Who Wants To Be A Millionaire" is a trademark of Disney ABC Domestic Television. ©2010 Ludia Inc. All rights reserved.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
